choices: Switches bodies with someone in the family.
Tells the family about the stranger and what he said.
Ariel hears the conversation with her Mom and the stranger, wants to swap bodies
1.title: After Saying Goodbye to the Stranger

11.content: Who does she decide she wants to swap bodies with?
11.title: Switches bodies with someone in the family.

info.description:
After a random stranger answers the doorbell and as Allison answers it the stranger says "Your family now has the ability to swap bodies by wearing the same exact same clothes they have worn from the past 30 minutes. Have fun."

Characters:
Allison - Mom, 41 years old. Always has wanted to be young again and have a new young boyfriend.
Joe - Dad, 43 years old. Married to Allison but hasn't been interested in her lately, wish she had a change in personality.
Ariel - Oldest daughter, 16 years old. Hates her sisters, wishes she was older.
Bridgette - Middle daughter, 12 years old. Smart, wishes she could be in charge for once.
Marie - Youngest daughter, 6 years old. Wants to get more attention.

Have fun and please keep the body swaps between the same people, for example: not like Allison swaps with Ariel, and Ariel swaps with Marie.
